I'd like to tell you all not to hold anything against the DBZSF RPG 
just because of one member's outburst in the NBWRPG's messageboard. 
The DBZSF RPG has some excellent role players, and I suggest you go 
and check them out. (http://dbzsf.topcities.com/)
